text.section: The Department may certify a service contract to the Board of Public Works as provided in this section.

The Department may certify a service contract that is not exempt under subsection (b) of this section only if:
the unit that seeks to enter into the service contract has complied with § 13-405 of this subtitle; and
the Department finds that:
the potential economic advantage of entering into the service contract is not outweighed by the preference stated in § 13-402 of this subtitle;
the service contract does not adversely affect the affirmative action efforts of this State;
the service contract includes adequate control mechanisms to ensure that the services will be performed in accordance with the service contract; and
the service contract complies with all of the requirements of Division II of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
